sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; let FundingInstance = require('./eth/Funding') let web3 = require('./utils/InitWeb3'); let project = {} let state = '' let ddl = '' let proposals = [] let result = [] class my_joined_funding_detail extends React.Component { constructor() { super(); this.state={ accounts: '', money:0, content:'' } } componentWillMount = async () => { project = {} //清空 proposals = [] project = await FundingInstance.methods.allFundings(this.props.match.params.id).call() project.usedMoney = web3.utils.fromWei(project.usedMoney, 'ether') project.goalMoney = web3.utils.fromWei(project.goalMoney, 'ether'); project.raisedMoney = web3.utils.fromWei(project.raisedMoney, 'ether') let proposal_length = project.proposalsLength for(let i = 1; i <= proposal_length; i++){ let proposal = { content:'', amount:0, agreeAmount:0, disAmount:0, goal:0, isAgreed:false, p_state:'', my_attitude:false, total:0 } result = [] result = await FundingInstance.methods.getProposal(this.props.match.params.id, i).call() proposal.content = result[0] proposal.amount = result[1] proposal.amount = web3.utils.fromWei(proposal.amount, 'ether') proposal.agreeAmount = result[2] proposal.agreeAmount = web3.utils.fromWei(proposal.agreeAmount, 'ether') proposal.disAmount = result[3] proposal.goal = result[4] proposal.goal = web3.utils.fromWei(proposal.goal, 'ether') proposal.total = proposal.goal * 2 proposal.isAgreed = result[5] console.log(proposal.isAgreed) if(proposal.isAgreed){ proposal.p_state = "Approved" } else{ proposal.p_state = "Unapproved" } proposals.push(proposal) } ddl = project.deadline let current_time = Date.parse(new Date()) if(project.isSuccess === true){ state = "Finished" } else{ if(ddl - current_time >= 0){ state = "Ongoing" } else{ state = "Expired" } } ddl = (new Date(parseInt(ddl))).toLocaleDateString() let accounts = await web3.eth.getAccounts() this.setState({ // manager: manager, accounts: accounts }) }; async up(e, value, proposal_id){ let flag if(value === 1){ flag = true await FundingInstance.methods.agreeProposal(this.props.match.params.id, proposal_id.index + 1, flag).send({from:this.state.accounts[0]}) //proposals[proposal_id.index].my_attitude = true alert('Approved successfully!') } else{ flag = false await FundingInstance.methods.agreeProposal(this.props.match.params.id, proposal_id.index + 1, flag).send({from:this.state.accounts[0]}) //proposals[proposal_id].my_attitude = false alert('Declined successfully!') } } render() { return (
    Punch Go
    {/**/} {/*
    */} {/*// */}
  • Home
  • All Punches
    • {/**/} {/*
    */}
  • Initiate a Punch
    • {/**/} {/*
    */}
  • My Punches
    My Punches:
    Punches Initiated Punches Participated
  • Current Account Address：{this.state.accounts[0]}
Activity Details
Activity Initiator：{project.initiator}
Activity Name：{project.title}Activity Deadline：{ddl}
Activity Status：{state}
Activity Deposit：{project.goalMoney}eth
Current Total Deposit：{project.raisedMoney - project.usedMoney}eth
Remaining Participators：{project.usedMoney}
Number of Participators：{project.fundersLength}
Activity Description：

{project.content}

Punch Details
{ (proposals.length===0) ?null :proposals.map((item,index)=>{ return (
this.up(e,1, {index}) }> Approve     this.up(e,0, {index}) }> Decline
Punch Day
{item.amount}
Agreed Percentage
{(item.agreeAmount/item.total).toFixed(4)*100}%
Punch Content
{item.content}
) },this) }
); } } export default my_joined_funding_detail;
